title: [Ta'Illistim, BriarStone Court]
description: Deep blue slate clads the nearby shop, a dull contrast to the brighter blue tiles that form the building's sturdy roof.  Windowboxes planted with bright red begonias bring cheer to the stately structure.  A brass plaque is mounted to the shop's front door.

Matte white marble clads the nearby shop, a sharp contrast to the brighter, glossier blue tiles that form the building's sturdy roof.  Window-boxes planted with white clover bring cheer to the stately structure.  A silver plaque is mounted to the shop's lapis-painted front door.
